sourcesContent:
import React,{useState}from 'react' function UpdateProduct({updateProduct,product,changeShow}) { const [name,setName]=useState(product.name) const [imagUrl,setimageUrl]=useState(product.imagUrl) const [price,setPrice]=useState(product.price) const [description,setdescription]=useState(product.description) return (
setName(e.target.value)} defaultValue={name} id="exampleInputEmail1" aria-describedby="emailHelp"/>
setimageUrl(e.target.value)} defaultValue={imagUrl} id="exampleInputPassword1"/>
setdescription(e.target.value)} defaultValue={description} id="exampleInputPassword1"/>
setPrice(e.target.value)} defaultValue={price} id="exampleInputEmail1" aria-describedby="emailHelp"/>
) } export default UpdateProduct
